name: Skinner
description:
Clicker type game about Skinner the rat who lives in his box. He loves a casual play and rewards, unaware that he is the one who is being played with.

The game connects the dots between early experiments in behavioral psychology and their current application in algorithmically-controlled environments, especially free-to-play games and social networks, where your every step is monitored, measured and exploited by army of bots.
